mng: succession (to a title), to inherit, continuing (a tradition), posterity

exm.mng: succession (to a title), to inherit, continuing (a tradition), posterity
Tan Sitong (1865-1898), Qing writer and politician, one of the Six Gentlemen Martyrs 戊戌六君子 of the unsuccessful reform movement of 1898
from then on, after, afterwards, thereafter
to succeed to a title, to inherit
Ni Sichong (1868-1924), general closely linked to Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯 during his unsuccessful 1915 bid for Empire
lit. a following echo, fig. to continue (a tradition)
to continue, to continue a family line, posterity, heir
